issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This is regression, this works on 2.0.2 GA

Button clicks on firefox browser do not show the buttons being clicked.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Make a default app in the studio.
2. Copy the attached app.js to resources.
3. Publish it for mobile web.
4. Change the DNS to your computers ip.
5. Launch the app through the firefox browser(desktop).
6. Tap on a button like 'feature event','nav event' etc.

Actual Result:
1. When you tap on a button there is no click animation.

Expected Result:
1. Tapping on the button should show click animation.

Note: we do not see the click but the analytics events are getting generated.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Analytics - Button clicks on firefox browser do not show the buttons being clicked.
fields.environment:
Tested On:
Titanium studio : 2.1.0.201206251749
SDK version : 2.1.0. GA
Firefox 13

comments.body: Marking ticket as "Won't Fix" as MobileWeb has been deprecated.
